name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル3 飢餓地獄

description: The third level of Impel Down where prisoners are subjected to extreme heat and thirst. This level serves as the battleground for Ivankov's desperate stand against Magellan.

keyEvents.title: Inazuma Cuts the Stairs
keyEvents.description: Inazuma uses the Choki Choki no Mi to cut the staircase between Level 3 and Level 2.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a temporary barrier against Magellan's pursuit.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov vs Magellan Battle
keyEvents.description: Ivankov fights Magellan on Level 3 to buy time for the escapees.
keyEvents.significance: A major confrontation showing the Revolutionary Army's sacrifice for Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Magellan Defeats Ivankov
keyEvents.description: Magellan overwhelms Ivankov with his poison abilities on this level.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Magellan's overwhelming power as warden.

statusHistory.reason: Level functions normally despite the battle

name.english: Impel Down Level 2 - Wild Beast Hell
name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル2 猛獣地獄

description: The second level of Impel Down, home to various fierce beasts. This level becomes a transit point during the prison break.

keyEvents.title: Magellan Uses Venom Road
keyEvents.description: Magellan uses Venom Road to travel from Level 3 to Level 2, bypassing the destroyed stairs.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's mobility abilities with his devil fruit.

keyEvents.title: Inazuma Poisoned
keyEvents.description: Magellan poisons Inazuma on Level 2 after they attempt to delay him.
keyEvents.significance: Another casualty in the desperate escape attempt.

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル1 紅蓮地獄

description: The first level of Impel Down, characterized by a forest of bladed trees and grass. This is the final level the escapees must pass through to reach freedom.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Reaches Level 1
keyEvents.description: Luffy and his allies successfully reach Level 1, the final obstacle before escaping Impel Down.
keyEvents.significance: Major progress toward escape and reaching Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Reunion with Buggy and Mr. 3
keyEvents.description: Luffy reunites with Buggy and Galdino on Level 1.
keyEvents.significance: Brings together the various escape groups.

keyEvents.title: Defeat of the Jailer Beasts
keyEvents.description: Luffy and allies defeat all four Jailer Beasts on Level 1.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the overwhelming power of the allied escapees.

keyEvents.title: Magellan's Final Stand
keyEvents.description: Magellan confronts Luffy and all the escapees on Level 1 with his Hydra.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the climactic battle of the Impel Down arc.
